content: Hi all, I've been trying to get a simple setup to work: I have a flake that builds emacs from source and I wanted to use the nix-treesitter flake to equip emacs with treesitter grammars. I cannot seem to find a way to actually link the built grammars to emacs, I tried adding nix-treesitter to propagatedBuildInputs or linking it manually in a postInstall script but neither worked. Any help is appreciated :folded_hands:
